query.where: SourceNr = '{$input.in_ProformaNr}' and SourceScreen != '140' and MoveCode in ( select atr.MoveCode from AcctTrans atr inner join InvoiceHeader ih on (atr.SourceNr = ih.ProformaNr) inner join InvoiceItems ii on ih.ProformaNr = ii.ProformaNr AND atr.Movecode IN ('NL') WHERE ih.ProformaNr = '{$input.in_ProformaNr}' ) AND JournalNr in ( select atr.JournalNr from AcctTrans atr inner join InvoiceHeader ih on ( atr.EntCode = ih.RevEntity and atr.JournalNr = ih.JournalRev ) inner join InvoiceItems ii on ih.ProformaNr = ii.ProformaNr AND cast(ii.LineNr as varchar(500)) = case when CHARINDEX('Service:', atr.LineRef)>0 and CHARINDEX(';RFee', atr.LineRef)>0 and CHARINDEX(';LineRef', atr.LineRef)>0 then SUBSTRING(atr.LineRef, CHARINDEX('LineRef:',atr.LineRef)+8, LEN(atr.LineRef)-(CHARINDEX('LineRef:',atr.LineRef)+8)) else atr.LineRef end WHERE ih.ProformaNr = '{$input.in_ProformaNr}' ) AND EntCode in ( select atr.EntCode from AcctTrans atr inner join InvoiceHeader ih on (atr.sourcenr = ih.proformanr) inner join InvoiceItems ii on ih.ProformaNr = ii.ProformaNr AND cast(ii.LineNr as varchar(500)) = case when CHARINDEX('Service:', atr.LineRef)>0 and CHARINDEX(';RFee', atr.LineRef)>0 and CHARINDEX(';LineRef', atr.LineRef)>0 then SUBSTRING(atr.LineRef, CHARINDEX('LineRef:',atr.LineRef)+8, LEN(atr.LineRef)-(CHARINDEX('LineRef:',atr.LineRef)+8)) else atr.LineRef end WHERE ih.ProformaNr = '{$input.in_ProformaNr}' ) and acctkey not in ('12100000', '72010000') --AcctType <> '1'

EntCode = '{$temp.tmp_InvoiceHeader.RefCode}' and MatterCode = '{$temp.tmp_InvoiceHeader.MatterCode}' and seqnr = (select max(seqnr) from RecurringFees where entcode = '{$temp.tmp_InvoiceHeader.RefCode}' and mattercode ='{$temp.tmp_InvoiceHeader.MatterCode}')
TabCode = 'APIT' and Name = 'ProfitCenter' and ElNote = '{$temp.tmp_ServCode_Prefix}' and InUse = '1'

assignment.title: SecurityDeposit-H Assignment to Items, DebtorItems, ProductTaxItems etc.
SecurityDeposit-I Assignment to Items, DebtorItems, ProductTaxItems etc.
